title: what?
body: so I got to level 5 with blitz, and in the same match I got an S- yet no token? is there something im missing? because im pretty sure you're supposed to get a token with every S- or higher when you're level 5, if so can some rioter add a token blitz is my main

replies.body: Grats on your progress with Blitzcrank!  It's not possible to receive a token in the same game that you reach level 5.  You'll have to already be level 5 at the start of the match.  Let me know if that clears things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TywOF8mi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-30T18:26:34.056+0000)
>
> Grats on your progress with Blitzcrank!  It's not possible to receive a token in the same game that you reach level 5.  You'll have to already be level 5 at the start of the match.  Let me know if that clears things up!

yeah yeah it does, thanks! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
